alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:38AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mitchell, Howard, Floyd, western Chickasaw, western Winona, Olmsted, Mower, Wabasha, eastern Dodge and western Fillmore Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 137 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Goodhue to 7 miles southwest of Sheffield. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mazeppa around 145 AM CDT. Wabasha around 225 AM CDT. Kellogg around 230 AM CDT. Alma around 240 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
